TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataColumnSelectionConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供表示 控制項中繫結資料行欄位名稱之屬性的型別轉換子 (Type Converter)。

span.span: Provides a type converter for a property representing the field name of a bound column field in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用將之前指派的物件類型轉換成控制項屬性的類別。Use the class to convert object types before assignment to a control property. 一般情況下，類別支援將轉換的字串物件類型，並提供一份標準的值指派給關聯的控制項屬性。In general, the class supports converting string object types and supplies a list of standard values available for assignment to the associated control property. 標準值集合是在目前的繫結資料行欄位的欄位名稱的清單控制項。The standard values collection is the list of field names for bound column fields for the current control. 若要支援轉換其他物件的型別，衍生的類別，並覆寫和的其他物件類型的方法。To support converting additional object types, derive a class from and override the and methods for the additional object types. 若要支援自訂的標準可指派的值清單，覆寫方法。To support a custom list of standard assignable values, override the method. 適用於屬性來指定與控制項屬性的型別轉換子類別。Apply the attribute to specify the class as the type converter for a control property. 例如，的屬性控制項會指定為其型別轉換子。For example, the property of the control specifies as its type converter. > [!NOTE] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反地，藉由呼叫適當的轉換程式物件。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例。For more information, see the examples in . 方法會指出這個轉換子支援傳回一份可用的值，透過方法。The method indicates that the converter supports returning a list of available values through the method. 方法表示清單不是可能值的獨佔清單。The method indicates that the list is not an exclusive list of possible values.

span.span: Design-Time Architecture

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反地，藉由呼叫適當的轉換程式物件。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例。For more information, see the examples in .

The type to convert from.

summary.span: 指出指定的來源型別是否可以轉換為相關聯控制項屬性的型別。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified source type can be converted to the type of the associated control property.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換器可以執行轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以判斷是否方法支援轉換的來源類型。Call the method to determine whether the method supports converting the source type. 方法可以只將字串轉換，因此方法會傳回`true`當`sourceType`是一個字串。The method can convert only from a string, so the method returns `true` when `sourceType` is a string.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value);

Public Overrides Function ConvertFrom (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, culture As CultureInfo, value As Object) As Object

override this.ConvertFrom : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * System.Globalization.CultureInfo * obj -> obj

param.name: context
param.span: 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.

span.span: The object that can be used to support localization features.
The object to convert.

summary.span: 將指定物件轉換成關聯控制項屬性的型別。

span.span: Converts the specified object to the type of the associated control property.

returns.span: 執行個體，表示轉換的物件。

span.span: An instance that represents the converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`是一個字串，則字串表示`value`會傳回。If `value` is a string, then the string representation of `value` is returned. 如果`value`是`null`，空字串 ("") 會傳回。If `value` is `null`, an empty string ("") is returned. 如需所有其他值，擲回例外狀況。For all other values, a exception is thrown. 呼叫方法，以判斷是否方法支援轉換的來源類型。Call the method to determine whether the method supports converting the source type.

span.span: The conversion could not be performed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValues (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection
public: override System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter::StandardValuesCollection ^ GetStandardValues(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);
override this.GetStandardValues : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection

param.name: context
param.span: 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 傳回可指派給關聯控制項屬性之可用數值的清單。

span.span: Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to the associated control property.

returns.span: 執行個體，包含可用於指派給相關聯控制項屬性的值。

span.span: A instance containing available values for assignment to the associated control property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用屬性指定`context`物件，以取得實作。The method uses the property of the specified `context` object to obtain an implementation. 如果實作，它用來在設計階段存取相關聯的控制項，並擷取可用值的清單，從相關聯元件。If the implementation is available, it is used to access the associated control at design time and retrieve the list of available values from the associated component. 可用值的集合中的繫結資料行欄位從建置控制項。The collection of available values is built from the bound column fields in the control. 繫結資料行欄位組成中的物件集合，以及從資料來源中的欄位自動產生的繫結的資料行欄位。The bound column fields consist of objects in the collection, and from the bound column fields automatically generated for fields in the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool GetStandardValuesExclusive (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);

param.name: context
param.span: 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 指出這個轉換子是否傳回包含所有可能數值的清單，而該數值可以指派給關聯控制項屬性。

span.span: Indicates whether this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子傳回包含所有可能數值的清單，而這些數值可以指派給關聯控制項屬性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法執行個體會傳回`false`，表示所傳回的清單方法不是所有可能的指派值的獨佔清單。The method for a instance returns `false`, indicating that the list returned by the method is not an exclusive list of all possible assignable values.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool GetStandardValuesSupported (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesSupported(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValuesSupported (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As Boolean
public: override bool GetStandardValuesSupported(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);
override this.GetStandardValuesSupported : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> bool

param.name: context
param.span: 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 指出這個轉換子是否傳回一組可用值，以指派給指定內容 (Context) 內的控制項屬性。

span.span: Indicates whether this converter returns a set of available values for assignment to a control property, within the specified context.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子傳回一組標準可用值，以指派給關聯的控制項屬性則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter returns a standard set of available values for assignment to the associated control property; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會指出這個轉換子是否支援傳回一份可用的值，透過方法。The method indicates whether the converter supports returning a list of available values through the method. 方法物件會傳回`true`如果指定`context`物件提供中的實作其屬性。The method for the object returns `true` if the specified `context` object supplies an implementation in its property. 方法會使用實作，以在設計階段存取相關聯的控制項，並擷取可用的繫結從相關聯的資料行欄位元件。The method uses the implementation to access the associated control at design time and retrieve the list of available bound column fields from the associated component.
